title: 怎么办啊！
txt_content: 从上次重启都有这样的报错 The updater could not contact dev.bukkit.org for updating.If you have not recently modified your configuration and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site may be experiencing temporary downtime.

replies.author: weiliang_dada
replies.txt_content: 这个报错是因为无法连接升级服务器导致，不影响正常开服！
